rounds.comments: (Alex: There were a number of important anniversaries last year & this is our way of paying tribute to those.)

clues.text: April 1987 was the 25th anniversary of the U.S. probe "landing" here

Term for the outer shell of the Earth, or a pie

rounds.text: Air Force pilot Gail Halvorson earned the nickname "Candy Bomber" for his actions during this 1948-49 event
rounds.response: the Berlin airlift (or Berlin air drop)
